data.comment: The match has started.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Sampdoria in their own half.
In the minute 1, Ball safe as Milan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Milan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sampdoria's half?
In the minute 5, Free kick for Sampdoria in their own half.
Throw-in for Milan in the half of Sampdoria.
Franck Kessie (Milan) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 8, Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
In Genoa, Lorenzo Tonelli (Sampdoria) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Gianpaolo Calvarese.
In the minute 9, Milan will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Sampdoria.
Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Gianpaolo Calvarese.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a throw-in for Sampdoria, close to Milan's area.
In the minute 11, Ball goes out of play for a Milan goal kick.
Ante Rebic (Milan) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Milan.
In the minute 13, The match at Luigi Ferraris has been interrupted briefly for a check on Matteo Gabbia, who is down injured.
Matteo Gabbia is back on his feet again.
Gianpaolo Calvarese awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Milan in their own half.
Goal kick for Sampdoria at Luigi Ferraris.
Bartosz Bereszynski is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Milan in the half of Sampdoria.
Milan drives forward and Ante Rebic gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Sampdoria awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Milan at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 20, Claudio Ranieri (Sampdoria) has taken off Bartosz Bereszynski who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Omar Colley is the replacement.
Milan have been awarded a corner by Gianpaolo Calvarese.
In the minute 26, At Luigi Ferraris, Adrien Silva has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Milan drive forward but Ante Rebic is judged offside.
Throw-in Milan.
In the minute 30, Corner awarded to Milan.
Milan are pushing forward but Alexis Saelemaekers's finish is wide of the goal.
Sampdoria have a goal kick.
In the minute 32, Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Sampdoria in their own half.
Free kick Sampdoria.
Can Milan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sampdoria's half?
In the minute 34, Sampdoria needs to be cautious. Milan have an attacking throw-in.
Sampdoria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Sampdoria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 35, Sampdoria pushes forward through Manolo Gabbiadini, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in Milan.
Free kick for Milan in their own half.
In the minute 37, Gianpaolo Calvarese awards Sampdoria a goal kick.
In Genoa, Ante Rebic of Milan is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Milan.
In the minute 40, Milan attack but Matteo Gabbia's header doesn't find the target.
Matteo Gabbia (Milan) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Milan have been awarded a corner by Gianpaolo Calvarese.
In the minute 41, Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a Milan throw-in in Sampdoria's half.
Throw-in for Sampdoria in their own half.
Sampdoria awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sampdoria's Lorenzo Tonelli looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 43, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Lorenzo Tonelli.
An attacking Milan player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Milan in their own half.
Throw-in for Sampdoria at Luigi Ferraris.
Sampdoria to take a throw-in in Milan territory.
In the minute 45, Milan's Brahim Diaz breaks free at Luigi Ferraris. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Genoa.
Gianpaolo Calvarese blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Goal! Franck Kessie gives Milan a 0-1 lead from the penalty spot.
In the minute 45, Jakub Jankto (Sampdoria) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Genoa.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Sampdoria.
Jens Hauge is replacing Brahim Diaz for the away team.
Sampdoria make their second substitution with Albin Ekdal replacing Adrien Silva.
In the minute 46, The home team replace Jakub Jankto with Mikkel Damsgaard.
Sandro Tonali hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Genoa for Milan.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Sampdoria close to the penalty box.
In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Milan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a Sampdoria throw-in in Milan's half.
Free kick for Milan in the half of Sampdoria.
Important block from the Sampdoria defence as Hakan Calhanoglu fires in a strike for Milan.
In the minute 53, Corner awarded to Milan.
Sampdoria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Sampdoria in their own half.
In the minute 54, In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Sampdoria in the half of Milan.
Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Gianpaolo Calvarese.
In the minute 57, Gianpaolo Calvarese awards the home team a throw-in.
Gianpaolo Calvarese waits before resuming play because Manolo Gabbiadini for Sampdoria is still down.
Claudio Ranieri (Sampdoria) is making a fourth change, with Antonio La Gumina replacing the possibly injured Manolo Gabbiadini.
In the minute 58, Sampdoria awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sampdoria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Sampdoria in their own half.
In the minute 60, Throw-in Milan.
Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Gianpaolo Calvarese.
In the minute 62, Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
Sampdoria to take a throw-in in Milan territory.
Throw-in high up the field for Sampdoria in Genoa.
In the minute 63, Can Sampdoria capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Free kick in a good position for Sampdoria!
Milan's Hakan Calhanoglu gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sampdoria defender.
In the minute 67, Ball safe as Sampdoria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Milan at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 69, Sampdoria surge into the attack at Luigi Ferraris but Morten Thorsby’s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Milan goal kick.
Antonio La Gumina for Sampdoria gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 70, Gianpaolo Calvarese awards Milan a goal kick.
Can Milan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sampdoria's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 73, Milan have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Sampdoria at Luigi Ferraris.
Free kick for Milan in their own half.
In the minute 76, Samu Castillejo is replacing Alexis Saelemaekers for Milan at Luigi Ferraris.
Goal! Samu Castillejo extends Milan's lead to 0-2.
Ante Rebic with an assist there.
In the minute 78, Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Milan in their own half.
Ante Rebic of Milan is pulled up for offside.
Milan's Ante Rebic misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 80, Ball goes out of play for a Sampdoria goal kick.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Tommaso Augello for Sampdoria who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Tommaso Augello has recovered and rejoins the match in Genoa.
Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Gianpaolo Calvarese.
In the minute 82, The home team has substituted Tommaso Augello with Mehdi Leris. Claudio Ranieri is thus making his fifth change.
Goal! Sampdoria reduce the deficit to 1-2 through Albin Ekdal.
In the minute 84, Sampdoria have a dangerous throw-in.
Gianpaolo Calvarese awards the away team a throw-in.
Gianpaolo Calvarese awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 86, Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Milan in their own half.
Sampdoria awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Milan in their own half.
Milan to take a throw-in in Sampdoria territory.
Gianpaolo Calvarese will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Gianpaolo Calvarese awards Sampdoria a goal kick.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Sampdoria in their own half.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Sampdoria.
Sampdoria are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Ball safe as Sampdoria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Sampdoria close to the penalty box.
Sampdoria's Albin Ekdal attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
The match has come to a close in Genoa. The final score is 1-2.
Stefano Pioli (Milan) is making a third substitution, with Rade Krunic replacing Hakan Calhanoglu.
